name: ChronoJump
description:
A puzzle game where you explore a laboratory to repair your time machine to get back home.

Controls WASD to move E to interact Hints (spoilers!)
  • The white boxes are the batteries.
  • Use the time machine frequently and look for changes.
  • Explore all the corners of the rooms.
Created by

bei64
yanniboi
SadGhost
FlameBand

Asset Credits
